# cook your code here
T = int(raw_input())
for i in range(T):
    (n,m) = map(int,raw_input().split())
    if n<m:
        if n%2==0:
            print "L"
        else:
            print "R"
    elif m<n:
        if m%2==0:
            print "U"
        else:
            print "D"
    else:
        if n%2==0:
            print "L"
        else:
            print "R"
